JIM4.original: Use the pipe bombs to destroy another ~r~van.~s~
JIM4.translated: 使用土制炸弹炸毁另一辆~r~面包车。~s~

JIM4.original: One of the ~r~A.O.D. vans~s~ is nearby.
JIM4.translated: 其中一辆~r~死亡天使面包车~s~就在附近。

JIM4.original: ~s~You can throw pipe bombs from vehicles by pressing ~INPUT_VEH_ATTACK~.
The ~r~Angels of Death~s~ have spotted you, don't let them escape.
JIM4.translated: ~r~死亡天使~s~发现你了，别让他们逃走。
~s~按~INPUT_VEH_NEXT_WEAPON~切换在载具上所用的武器。

JIM4.original: Use the pipe bombs to blow up the Angel of Death ~r~vans.~s~
JIM4.translated: 用土制炸弹炸毁死亡天使的~r~面包车。~s~

JIM4.original: ~s~The longer you hold down ~INPUT_VEH_ATTACK~ the shorter the fuse will become.

JIM4.translated: ~s~按~INPUT_VEH_HEADLIGHT~切换在载具上所用的武器。

JIM4.original: That van won't cause anymore trouble, get back on your ~b~bike.~s~
JIM4.translated: 现在那辆面包车不足为患了，回到你的~b~摩托~s~上。
